item.title: Microservices, RPCs, SOAP, REST & GraphQL
item.author: Gerald Maduabuchi
item.description: Introduction This article will cover the topic of application programming interfaces, which is an essential unit that makes up the microservice architecture. The Microservice Architecture. The micro service architecture is a type of application architecture where the application is broken into several units, communicating effectively with each other over a network protocol. In contrast to monolith applications, which contains the entire logic, client side and server side units in one package that is deployed on a server.
